nodes.text: Commenor was a planet[source?] located in the Colonies region of the galaxy.
Rebel General Jan Dodonna hailed from Commenor, as did the Imperial officer Fatimah Nurii. During the reign of the Galactic Empire, the planet was home to an underground resistance movement.

In the aftermath of the Battle of Endor in 4 ABY, the Empire targeted Commenor as part of Operation: Cinder, attempting to destroy the world after the death of the Emperor. Civilizations on the world saw devastation at the hands of the Empire's fleets as a result. Thirty years after the Battle of Endor, Commenor was a member world in the New Republic, where it was represented in the Galactic Senate by Thanlis Depallo.
